semantic_identifier: [GOLD-130]: Apply Simple Mode progressive disclosure across Alerts/Templates/Models settings (post-onboarding)
title: Apply Simple Mode progressive disclosure across Alerts/Templates/Models settings (post-onboarding)

sections.text: After a workspace selects Simple Mode, the main configuration screens for alerts, templates, and models still expose all advanced knobs and can overwhelm small teams. Update these settings pages to respect the workspace mode by showing only the core, recommended controls by default and moving advanced options behind an explicit “Advanced settings” section. Ensure the mode is consistently enforced on navigation/refresh and that switching to Advanced later reveals (not resets) the existing configuration.
